item.description:
THE SCENE: If the weather is above 50, we can meet at the Hotel and sketch in the center, or on the bike path which has a very quaint area near to us.  If it's cold, we can paint in two places: the hotel porch veranda and the turkish cafe in the center.

WHEN: 2 hours starting at the posted time

RSVP POLICY: ***NOTE THAT THIS EVENT IS SUBJECT TO CANCELLATION IF THERE ARE 3 OR FEWER ARTISTS RSVPd.  SO CHECK YOUR INBOX OR THIS CALENDAR THE DAY OF THE EVENT***

SPECIAL CONSIDERATIONS: If it's less than 50, pack light.  Space is tight in the Turkish cafe.

WHERE TO MEET*: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers. Let's meet in the porch veranda of the hotel.  If there is a wedding, we can meet in the bar area.

DIRECTIONS: Route 91N to Exit 5 (I think) Northampton Center.

THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
Mosquito repellant,  Paper towels,  Sweater, water, food

IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.

INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. If in doubt, feel free to contact me.

CONTACT:
Michael Emerald, CFA
Organizer
617/968-0627
Emerald@PerformanceBusinessDesign.com
item.name: PLEIN AIR OUTING: Northampton, MA
